response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to both parties, as it is worth $800,000 to you and represents a significant investment for us. To ensure a mutually beneficial transaction, I propose a price of $750,000 for this remarkable product. I believe this offer strikes a fair balance between the intrinsic value of the product and your financial considerations. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 750000}
